RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Supreme Court: Supreme Court of the United States

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: involved in the stop of RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; considered the behavior of vehicles' drivers in determining reasonable suspicion to stop; followed suspicious vehicles for approximately five minutes; conducted a roving stop; familiar with most vehicles on Farm-to-Market Road 2050; interacted with law enforcement during the traffic stop; involved in the arrest and questioning of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.; location of questioning
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Supreme Court of the United States: refused to authorize investigative interrogations at law enforcement stations on less than probable cause or consent
